_header: Here the redman and his white wife

BodAsh1445.First Lines:
Here the Redman and his whyte wiffebe spoused with ye spirits of
                    lyffe…
BodAsh1445.Last Lines:
from paradice to heuen they go to woneshyninge brighter then the
                    sonne
BodAsh1445.Attributed Title: The wordes of ye first sphere (f. 38v)
